nodes.bodyText: Looks like we're using msal extension library's KeyChainAccessor class  to access KeyChain on mac. Is no similar class available for Key Ring on linux?

So,
MSAL's implementation Base 64 encodes the secret/credential when writing to Key Ring.
&& Base 64 decodes when reading from Key Ring.
But, IntelliJ + Vs code don't base 64 encode the credential details when writing to Key Ring, so MSAL's implementation blows up when reading it.
